channel.title: How do I port forward on my linkseys router?
channel.description:
Hi All, I was just wondering how do I port forward on my linkseys router, I have all the files ready but just can't port forward! Please could someone give me a step to step guide of how to do it.
Many Thanks James (musicmad441)

item.title: How do I port forward on my linkseys router?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

why do i put 101?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I port forward on my linkseys router?

item.title: How do I port forward on my linkseys router?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

go to aplication and gaming. select tcp. for both ports add the ports for your game. at the last box after ip adress, put 101
and then [b]check enable

Read full topic

item.title: How do I port forward on my linkseys router?
item.dc:creator: @Dynmk_T Dynmk T
item.description:
@Dynmk_T wrote:

[quote=“VorargC, post:11, topic:96265”]its not any harder on a laptop…
Just find your ip, type it in the address bar
username - admin
pass - admin
gaming applications>
server for application name port 43594 to 43594
both
your done.[/quote]Yep, thats all you need to do…God its not that hard.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I port forward on my linkseys router?

Just find your ip, type it in the address bar

both
your done.

item.title: How do I port forward on my linkseys router?
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

i got it i got it.

ok here we go. go to my computer. then on the left side internet connections.then you’ll see local area conections. doulbe click it. on the top, click the second tab , “support”. then you’ll see ip adress and so on. copy the default gateway, and paste into a internet adress bar. a little box will opop up. for user name type admin and the password is admin. then go to advanced tab on the top of that page.wait you can’t copy and paste, just write it in then. when your on the page, go to advanced at the top write corner. scroll down till you see Filtered
Private Port Range. change the box to TCP. replace 0~0 with 43594~43594. go to bottom of page and press aply. their you got it. i hope

Read full topic

item.title: How do I port forward on my linkseys router?
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

pass is admin leave username blank btw
and if 192.168.0.1 dont work try 192.168.1
but either or should work

Read full topic
item.source: How do I port forward on my linkseys router?

item.title: How do I port forward on my linkseys router?
item.dc:creator: @Dynmk_T Dynmk T
item.description:
@Dynmk_T wrote:

1.) Go to 192.168.0.1
2.) Go to gaming applications which should be at the top of the scrn.
3.) Port forward 43594.

And ur done.

Read full topic
